attributes.action: cap mortgage lending to 2.5 times single annual income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: house price rises are being made worse by banks lending more and more. it forces both parents to work to pay for a home instead of one staying home bringing up children. capping lending would force down prices and help bring back the traditional family.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
